|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=a |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=169.254.42.27 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:20:A6 |oui_eth=00:20:A6 }} {{TagLine|Skyline 802.11a Access Point}} - '''PN4040''' / '''Model 4040'''
[http://web.archive.org/web/20030205222136/http://www.proxim.com/products/all/skyline/pn4040/ Product page (via archive.org)] Per the FCC technical description... *the (stock) usable frequency range of the device is 5180-5320MHz w/ 20MHz wide and stepped channels *the device has a (stock) maximum output power of 50mW **peak antenna gain for the stock antennas is 6dBi
